talk.abstract: Programmers generally spend their time heads-down crafting complex technical solutions, however advocating and communicating in the wider business context is often challenging. This talk uses a visual approach to describe how business managers think, with the goal of increasing your personal communication effectiveness.

This talk uses a visual approach to describe how business managers think, with the goal of increasing your personal communication effectiveness.
talk.name: from business import logic
